language.name: English
language.__COMMENT__: This list must remain exactly the same as the standard translation list.

user.new:
Hello üòÑ
This is Private Messages, a bot made to buy and sell paid messages. Your account has been successfully created!

If you need help, you can use the /help command.
user.existing:
Hello üòÑ
This is Private Messages, a bot made to buy and sell paid messages.

If you need help, you can use the /help command.

payment.once: ‚ÑπÔ∏è Single payment The message the user is selling is in a single payment mode. This means that when you buy the message, you will only be charged once, even if you buy the same message again.
payment.multiple: ‚ÑπÔ∏è Recurring payment The message the user is selling is in recurring payment mode. This means that when you buy the message, you will be charged whenever you click buy message.

balance.self_amount: ‚öñÔ∏è Your wallet You have ${coins} coins. VYou have already purchased ${buys} messages.

settings.settings_body:
‚öôÔ∏è Settings panel:

Use the buttons below to change the bot settings.

notifications.body:
üîî Notifications:

Set whether you want to receive bot notifications when someone buys a message from you.

header.body: üí¨ Message Header: Here you can write a custom header to appear in your paid messages. To learn more about, you can use the /help header command. Your current header is: ${message}

change.body: Type the new message to use as a header. You can use the following variables (markdown available): $value (required) - Displays the message value to be sold. $totalamount - Shows your total balance. $firstname - Shows your first name. $username - Shows your username. You can cancel this command at any time using /cancel
change.need_value_var: Your message must contain the variable $value.

reset.success: You have reset the message to the default.

payment.body:
üíµ Payment:

Set whether you want your messages to be charged only once per user or whether they should pay each time they buy the same message.

language.body:
üî§ Language:

Choose your language from the list below.

restore.body: ‚Ñπ Account Restoration Reply this message with your backup key to perform the restore. To cancel the restore, use the /cancel command
restore.success: Your account has been successfully restored!
restore.invalid_key: Could not restore your account because your key is invalid.
restore.different_key: Could not restore your account because this key doesn't belong to you.
restore.error: Could not restore your account. Contact @andrrms to report this error.

help.standard: This is Private Messages, a bot for buying and selling paid messages. This bot is just for fun, since its economy has no real value. When you create your account, you start with 750 coins and can spend them on other paid messages to be able to read them. To sell a message, simply enter the bot user, followed by the message you want to sell. Value options will be shown as soon as you type the message. New features will be added soon. This bot was written by @andrrms using NodeJS + Typescript and is published under GPLv3.0 license. You can find the repository here. You can collaborate with translations here.
help.header: ‚ÑπÔ∏è About headers Message headers are custom texts that appear in your paid message. They are generally used to make the sale more characteristic of the owner or to describe the message being sold. You can use variables to display values in your header, such as your total balance or your first name. When writing a custom header, you must include the $value variable that shows the value of the message to be paid. This is to prevent possible clickbaits. The variables you can use are: $value (mandatory) - Shows the value of the message to be sold. $totalamount - Shows your total balance. $firstname - Shows your first name. $username - Shows your username.

common.user_not_found: The user in question was not found.
common.command_error: An error occurred while executing this command.
common.admin_only: You are not allowed to use this command.
common.message_on_private: You must use this command in a private chat with me.

callback_query.error: An error occurred while registering the payment.
